attributes.action: To allow concessionary bus passes to be allowed across country borders ie Wales to England or Scotland and vice versa
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: At the moment if a pass is issued in say England it cannot be used in Wales when the holder is on Holiday or any other reason

rejection.details: This is a devolved matter and should be directed to the Scottish Executive and Welsh Assemblies.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
